response.original_title: On The Road With Josh Ibbett: Rwanda
response.overview: Endurance rider Josh Ibbett has come to Rwanda to explore the African country's relationship with cycling. The landlocked nation is bouncing back from a terrible genocide in which 800,000 people lost their lives, and is now blossoming with economic and cultural growth. Josh discovers a warm hearted nation with an expanding cycling culture, and a national cycling centre with the most impressive workshop heâ€™s ever seen. Exploring the history and culture of this landlocked country Josh acclimatizes and uses his time exploring as training for the gruelling 1000km 5 day Tour of Rwanda.
response.title: On The Road With Josh Ibbett: Rwanda
